title: Lists to Dictionary
description: In this lab, you will learn how to combine two lists into a dictionary using the `zip()` and `dict()` functions in Python.

meta.title: Lists to Dictionary: Combining Data into a Python Dictionary
meta.description: Learn how to combine two lists into a Python dictionary using the zip() and dict() functions.
meta.keywords: data structures, python, list, dictionary, programming
